name: Pair of Mauve Modern Art Deco Style Leather Club Armchairs (set of 2)

condition.details: Wear consistent with age and use. Great overall vintage condition. Leather surface is free of marks or scratches. Minor wear visible on wood block feet.

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: Elegant pair of mauve leather club armchairs. Custom-made in the UK, these chairs blend Modern and Art Deco styles, offering a unique aesthetic that’s both chic and versatile. The chairs feature a square-angled backrest, curved armrests, and a boxed cushion seat. The chairs are set on wood block feet, adding a subtle warmth and stability to their sleek profile. Crafted with top-quality materials, the chairs are in great overall condition. Wear commensurate with age. The leather surface is free of marks or scratches. Dimensions: 31.5” W x 32” D x 31.5” H (each) Seat height 17.5”, seat depth 22”, arm height 22” art deco, modernist, modern, club chairs, armchairs, seating, chairs, leather chairs, leather seats, furniture, interior design, home design, home furnishings
